mean_en: a short description of the most important information about something :a summary or outline
word_etyma: syn一起 + opsis看 → synopsis 要目，摘要
short_phrase: a synopsis of his business plan
sentence: This is a quick synopsis of our business plan; you can read it in more detail later.
sentence_trans: 这是我们商业计划的一份快速摘要，之后你可以读到更多细节。
